H0.text: Flanders is part of what country. Netherlands

H1.text: Flanders is part of what country. France

H2.text: Flanders is part of what country. Germany

H3.text: Flanders is part of what country. Beljum

A4.text: The country is divided into three highly autonomous regions: the Flemish Region (Flanders) in the north, the Walloon Region (Wallonia) in the south, and the Brussels-Capital Region in the middle.

A5.text: Belgium is a parliamentary constitutional monarchy with a complex federal system structured on regional and linguistic grounds.

A6.text: The Flemish Region has an area of 13,626 km2 and accounts for only 45% of Belgium's territory, but 58% of its population.

A7.text: The Flemish Region is governed by the Flemish Community institutions.
